TopicTitle: Probes (shown) appear to receive “continuous free dV” after decoupling

Articles.Content:
25 second clip showing craft in very high orbit (Ap 75Mm, Pe 71.7Mm) with time to Ap increasing for no clear reason.

Carrier-probe launched 3 relay satellites in series and each experienced this phenomenon.

Later in my session, detaching (first) and later undocking an Apollo-style Munar-lander resulted in the lander experiencing phantom forces/uncommanded orbital changes.

V0.1.1, by the way.

Launched through Steam.

5900X, RTX 3080, 48 GB @ 3200 MHz
